languages.text: {n}Текст рапорта сух, а почерк — маниакально безупречен. Парой безжалостных формулировок Соломон вынес себе приговор: "не продемонстрировал преданности, отвечающей оказанной милости, и опустился до сознательной лжи".{/n}

{n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le rapport est rédigé dans un style très factuel, d'une main à la perfection pathologique. Solomorne juge ses propres actes en quelques lignes intransigeantes : « Je n'ai pas su faire preuve d'une loyauté digne des faveurs que l'on m'a accordées et je me suis rabaissé à mentir délibérément. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rapport est rédigé dans un style très factuel, d'une main à la perfection pathologique. Solomorne juge ses propres actes en quelques lignes intransigeantes : « Je n'ai pas su faire preuve d'une loyauté digne des faveurs que l'on m'a accordées et je me suis rabaissé à mentir délibérément. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}報告書の文面は無機質で、筆跡は病的なまでに完璧だった。ソロモーンは容赦ない言葉で、自らに判決を下していた。「示された厚意に見合う忠誠を示さず、意図的な虚偽に身を落とした」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}報告書の文面は無機質で、筆跡は病的なまでに完璧だった。ソロモーンは容赦ない言葉で、自らに判決を下していた。「示された厚意に見合う忠誠を示さず、意図的な虚偽に身を落とした」{/n}

languages.text: {n}El texto del informe es soso y la caligrafía es demasiado perfecta. Con un par de frases, Solomorne se juzga a sí mismo: «no he mostrado una lealtad acorde al favor recibido y me he rebajado a mentir intencionadamente».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El texto del informe es soso y la caligrafía es demasiado perfecta. Con un par de frases, Solomorne se juzga a sí mismo: «no he mostrado una lealtad acorde al favor recibido y me he rebajado a mentir intencionadamente».{/n}

languages.text: {n}这份报告的文字非常枯燥，笔迹出奇地完美。索罗蒙用一连串毫不留情的短语描述了自己的行为，为自己的所作所为下达了判决：“未能表现出与得到的恩惠相符的忠诚，甚至自轻自贱，蓄意说谎。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这份报告的文字非常枯燥，笔迹出奇地完美。索罗蒙用一连串毫不留情的短语描述了自己的行为，为自己的所作所为下达了判决：“未能表现出与得到的恩惠相符的忠诚，甚至自轻自贱，蓄意说谎。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rapor, kuru bir dille kaleme alınmış. El yazısı fazla kusursuz. Solomorne, acımasız bir üslupla kendi cezasını kendisi kesmiş: "Gösterilen iyi niyete layık sadakati gösteremedim ve alçalarak kasıtlı olarak yalan söyleme cüretinde bulundum."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rapor kuru bir dille kaleme alınmış, el yazısı ise fazla kusursuz. Solomorne, acımasız bir üslupla kendi cezasını kendisi kesiyor: "Gösterilen iyi niyete layık sadakati gösteremedim ve alçalarak kasıtlı olarak yalan söyleme cüretinde bulundum."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der sachliche Text des Berichtes ist in einer akribischen Handschrift verfasst. In einigen schonungslosen Passagen urteilt Solomorne über sich selbst: "Ich war nicht in der Lage, Loyalität angesichts der erwiesenen Gunst zum Ausdruck zu bringen und habe mich durch bewusste Lügen selbst erniedrigt."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The text of the report is dry and the handwriting pathologically perfect. In a couple of ruthless phrases, Solomorne passes judgement on himself: "failed to demonstrate loyalty in keeping with the favour shown and lowered myself to deliberate lying."{/n}
